attributes.action: Open the churches in UK for worship with immediate effect
attributes.additional_details: The Government have opened pubs and restaurants, with the increase in mental health issues caused by the lockdown, the churches are an essential service.
attributes.background: Give believers the choice of worship in churches. Open the churches

rejection.details:
Churches have been allowed to open since 4 July, so we're not sure what else you'd like the UK Parliament or Government to do. 

You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-for-the-safe-use-of-places-of-worship-during-the-pandemic-from-4-july/covid-19-guidance-for-the-safe-use-of-places-of-worship-during-the-pandemic-from-4-july

Whether a place of worship opens is a decision for those managing the premises, not the UK Parliament or Government. You could start a new petition calling for specific changes to the Government guidance on safe reopening.
